casebody.data:
State
v.
Shameil Dontel Smith 269P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Shameil Dontel Smith, for Smith, Shameil Dontel. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of July 2016 by Defendant to Transport:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
